amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for HUD annual contributions to assisted housing by $331 million and reduce by the same amount funds available for NASA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to increase HUD annual contributions to assisted housing and reduce by the same amount of funds available for NASA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 265 (Roll no. 590).
